5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: Mu’tamir narrated from his father, from Barakah, from Bashir bin Nahik, from Abu Hurairah:“The Prophet (ﷺ) supplicated for rain (raising his hands) until I saw or one could see the whiteness of his armpits.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الدُّعَاءِ فِي الاِسْتِسْقَاءِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning supplication for rain
